title: Cheesy Spinach and Potato Masala Omelette
ingredients: 1 medium potato, boiled, peeled and diced
instructions: Heat a pan with a little oil. Sauté the onion, ginger, and green chili (if using) until softened.
Add the diced potatoes and spinach. Cook until the spinach wilts.
Stir in the turmeric powder, garam masala, red chili powder (if using), and salt. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk. Season with salt.
Heat a separate non-stick pan with a little oil. Pour half of the egg mixture into the pan and cook until it starts to set.
Spoon half of the potato-spinach mixture onto one side of the omelette. Sprinkle with half of the cheese.
Fold the other half of the omelette over the filling. Cook for another minute or two until the cheese melts and the omelette is cooked through.
Repeat steps 5-7 with the remaining egg mixture, potato-spinach mixture, and cheese.
Serve hot with a side of chutney or ketchup (optional).
description: A flavorful and satisfying vegetarian omelette that combines the spices of Indian cuisine with the classic American breakfast staple. The cheesy filling of potatoes and spinach adds a healthy twist.
